General.Name: PATRIZIA AG
General.Description: PATRIZIA: A leading partner for global real assets. With operations around the world, PATRIZIA has been offering investment opportunities in real estate and infrastructure assets for institutional, semiprofessional and private investors for 39 years. PATRIZIA manages around EUR 58 billion in assets and employs nearly 1,000 professionals at 28 locations worldwide. PATRIZIA is making an impact since 1984 by helping children in need, since 1992 in close collaboration with Bunter Kreis ("colourful circle") in Germany for aftercare of children with severe diseases and since 1999 through its support for the PATRIZIA Foundation. The PATRIZIA Foundation has helped around 280,000 children in need worldwide gain access to education and thus, has given them the chance of a better life over the last 24 years.
